mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, John Augustine Washington III to Jane C. Washington, 1842 October 18
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, John Augustine, III, 1821-1861
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Marked as 'Private & Confidential,' John Augustine Washington writes from Mount Vernon to his mother in Charlestown about illness amongst enslaved workers at Mount Vernon; announces his proposal to Nelly; describes horse races; financial matters. Autograph letter signed, 4 pages, integral address panel.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Slaves -- Diseases
Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Elswyth Thane Beebe Collection of Washington Family Papers
